__e: Calm her? Here? She's not going to get violent and throw things around, is she?
Well... there was this man once, and he was violent and crazy... and dangerous, and I...
I think that he could become violent on that day. Hurt himself, somebody else.
There are two dead people, that died violent deaths.
Look, I appreciate the effort. But occasionally after a violent death, a man needs a period of time to wallow.
Well, tell me, Mr MacGyver, would you want to know that a very good possibility exists that you could die a violent death sometime during the next three hours?
